dcterms:description: A dataset containing knee joint motion data collected from a cadaver specimen, including positions of optical markers from bone pins and ultrasound holders, used for transforming actual 3D positions into an experimental coordinate frame.
dcterms:title: Knee joint motion dataset

dcterms:creator: K. Niu
V. Sluiter
J. Homminga
A. Sprengers
N. Verdonschot
dcterms:description: A dataset of A-mode ultrasound signals used for developing a novel ultrasound-based lower extremity motion tracking system.
dcterms:title: A-mode ultrasound signals dataset
